alert.note: Alert for Logan County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 3:56PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Logan County through 430 PM MDT... At 356 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fleming, or 17 miles east of Sterling, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fleming and Proctor. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
